alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Banner, or 17 miles east of Water Valley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bruce, Pittsboro, Banner, Matthews, Robbs and Sarepta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
